ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_modcl | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod M ) e. RR ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( A mod M ) e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | #P_modcl | |- ( ( B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( B mod M ) e. RR ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( B mod M ) e. RR ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> B e. RR ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> M e. RR+ ) |
| 8 |  | #P_modabs2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod M ) mod M ) = ( A mod M ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( A mod M ) mod M ) = ( A mod M ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_modabs2 | |- ( ( B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( B mod M ) mod M ) = ( B mod M ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( B mod M ) mod M ) = ( B mod M ) ) |
| 12 | 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 9, 11 | #P_modsub12d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ M e. RR+ ) -> ( ( ( A mod M ) - ( B mod M ) ) mod M ) = ( ( A - B ) mod M ) ) |
